Webkit

A framework by Edgeryders to configure and deploy static sites from Discourse

Get Started →

Discourse as CMS

Using Discourse, your community platform also serves as your Content Management System

Built with Vue + Webpack

Easy to extend with webpack and develop custom themes and components with Vue.

Open Source

Edgeryders Webkit is an open source community driven project under MIT license.

# Quick Installation

# clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/edgeryders/webkit_components && cd $_

# (optional) create a new config file
echo '{"sections": []}' > src/data/config.json

# start a local development server
npm run dev

# build to deploy
npm run build
